entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-10-18
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • ActivatorUtilities.CreateInstance is creating non-empty generic collections #109034
  • [.NET 9] DllImport with Custom Marshaler Passes non-null address when `null` value for field is specified. #109033
  • Microsoft.Owin.Security.OpenIdConnect not compatible with the latest Microsoft.IdentityModel.XX packages #109032
  • [Proposal] Efficient Dictionary Initialization #109029
  • .NET 8 Timer Implementation Has Silent Period Minimum and TokenBucketRateLimiter Is Not Aware of This #109027
  • [debugger] Inspector exceptions in debugger tests #109025
    10.0.0
  • System.Net.Http.Functional.Tests.TelemetryTest failing with differing string #109024
  • [API Proposal]: Infinite stack #109023
  • [API Proposal]: System.Formats.Asn1.AsnValueReader #109019
    10.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Keyed services; alternative registration API for existing non-keyed services #109017
  • KeyedService.AnyKey -> not working correctly #109016
  • Options Duplicated ListItem #109015
  • Issue with new X509CertificateLoader #109007
  • Cannot publish android project with ReadyToRun #109004

Closed

  • [Perf] Linux/x64: 35 Regressions on 10/11/2024 8:14:13 PM #108892
    10.0.0
  • Assert debugging `System.Private.CoreLib` in `DEBUG` build #108951
    10.0.0
  • Regression in net9.0 when calling a ServiceClient from a dynamically loaded Assembly #108517
    9.0.0
  • Complex Parse Methods Always Fail #109018
  • Android API 23, Runtime Crash in .NET 9 #106025
    9.0.0
  • [wasm] 2 runtime tests failing with emscripten 3.1.34 #84786
    10.0.0
  • [browser] RuntimeError: memory access out of bounds at dotnet.native.wasm.mono_jiterp_tlqueue_purge_all #108519
    9.0.0
  • MacOSx Binary doesn't support URL Scheme Invocations entry point #31688
  • Proposal: Add support for loading application assemblies in memory #31958
  • Add new API to expose framework information about the current app #33472
  • HebrewCalendar not working properly on client side blazor #107731

PullRequests

Created

  • JIT: Unroll more Equals/StartsWith/EndsWith on arm64 #109036
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Expose GCInfo size and EH clause count as metrics #109035
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [cdac] PrecodeStubs contract #109030
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Define a function prototype for YieldProcessor #109028
    area-PAL-coreclr
  • [API Implementation]: Expose CookieException constructors #109026
    area-System.Net, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Add CoherentParentDependency on node packages #109022
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Test: simplify gc memmove #109014
    needs-area-label
  • [release/8.0] Fix nativeaot outerloop #109010
    area-System.Globalization, 8.0.x
  • Exit with quick_exit when using debug UCRT #109006
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr

Merged

  • [release/9.0] Fix nativeaot outerloop #109009
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Globalization
  • [cdac] CodeVersions contract and tests #109021
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • [release/9.0] Handle building host test assets with stabilized package versions #109031
    Servicing-approved, area-Host, 9.0.0
  • Handle building host test assets with stabilized package versions #109020
    area-Host, 10.0.0
  • [release/9.0] Fix handling of appending keywords to boolean schemas. #108248
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Text.Json, 9.0.0
  • [release/9.0] Update the JSON schema exporter to reuse schemas more aggressively. #108800
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Text.Json, 9.0.0
  • [browser] update incorrect references #108352
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, community-contribution, os-browser, 10.0.0
  • [debugger] Throw with short and easily caught message in debugger tests. #109011
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • Simplify making IL base JIT Helpers #108349
    area-VM-coreclr
  • JIT: Break up try regions in `Compiler::fgMoveColdBlocks`, and fix contiguity later #108914
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/9.0] Initialize m_fInPlaceSS #109013
    Servicing-approved, area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • [release/9.0] Ensure a null PublicKey is supported on assembly refs #108928
    Servicing-approved, area-VM-coreclr, regression-from-last-release, 9.0.0
  • Initialize m_fInPlaceSS #109008
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • [wasm] Enable few tests #108977
    area-Infrastructure-mono, 10.0.0
  • Clean up in importervectorization.cpp #108818
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/9.0] Make System.Formats.Asn1 triple slash documentation the source of truth #108995
    documentation, Servicing-approved, area-System.Formats.Asn1
  • [release/9.0] Ignore *.pp files in .gitignore #109003
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure

Updated

  • Bump versions of maintenance-packages dependencies consumed in runtime #108806
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Add managed MachO signing #108992
    area-HostModel
  • Avoiding discarding exception details of `MissingMethodException` in `RuntimeType.CreateInstanceImpl` #108876
    area-System.Reflection, community-contribution
  • Move static helpers to managed #108167
    area-VM-coreclr
  • JIT: Run new block layout only in backend #107634
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • implement optimized nibblemap #108939
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Synthesize assembly names by default for ilproj-based tests #108997
    test-enhancement, area-ILTools-coreclr, needs-area-label
  • Add trim annotations to System.Configuration.ConfigurationManager #108464
    area-System.Configuration
  • Put brotli on the FetchContent plan #107166
    area-System.IO.Compression, 10.0.0
  • Unify dotnet/runtime on using Arcade -publish #108990
    area-Infrastructure
  • Update a few code paths to ensure the trimmer can do its job #106777
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics
  • Ensure Vector.Create is properly recognized as intrinsic #108945
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Delete IL verification failure helpers in importer #108996
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix `IsOSVersionAtLeast` when build or revision are not provided #108748
    area-System.Runtime, os-maccatalyst, 10.0.0
  • Fix the ListenerElement.Attributes property #108936
    area-System.Configuration, 10.0.0
  • [wasm] Do not use link flags for bitcode compilation #108846
    area-Build-mono
  • [LoongArch64] Include loongarch64 in supported nativeaot RIDs. #108962
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Switch to Azure Linux VM #108967
    area-Infrastructure
  • Make delegates immutable #99200
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Remove PAL_Random and move palrt APIs into the minipal #108999
    area-Infrastructure
  • Restructure JSImport/JSExport generators to share more code and utilize more Microsoft.Interop.SourceGeneration shared code #107769
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, source-generator
